column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had a bowl of the spicy tonkotsu miso ramen minus the ground pork
column5: and "american" mushrooms. It was really delicious and filling! Any extra toppings you order come on the side. I think that if you are ordering a topping like cabbage
column6: it's worth getting one order of it to split
column7: since they bring it out on a plate. I would probably skip the chicken next time
column8: since it wasn't anything special. My favorite parts were the thick noodles
